decks.notes: This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's strategy while maintaining steady aggression. By utilizing cards like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner to control the board, as well as powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Soulstone Sanctuary, you can quickly overwhelm your opponent. With a mix of removal spells like Go for the Throat and powerful creatures like Deep-Cavern Bat, this deck aims to keep the pressure on while keeping your opponent off balance.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and pump spells in order to deal damage quickly and efficiently. By combining creatures like Callous Sell-Sword and Emberheart Challenger with spells like Turn Inside Out and Monstrous Rage, you can create a powerful board presence and deal significant damage to your opponent. Leyline of Resonance can also help boost your creatures' power and toughness, while cards like Cacophony Scamp and Manifold Mouse provide additional creatures to attack with. Overall, this deck aims to be fast and aggressive in order to win the game as quickly as possible.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells, utilizing cards like Krenko, Mob Boss and Burnout Bashtronaut to deal significant damage. The inclusion of Agatha's Soul Cauldron provides additional reach and the ability to buff creatures for more damage. The deck aims to maintain board presence and pressure the opponent, with a mix of creatures and burn spells to efficiently close out the game. The mana base is optimized for consistent access to red mana sources to cast the aggressive spells in the deck.

The deck focuses on assembling the Omniscience Combo, which allows the player to cast spells without paying their mana cost. Abuelo's Awakening helps to find the key pieces of the combo, while cards like Confounding Riddle and Ephara's Dispersal provide disruption and protection. Fallaji Archaeologist and Floodfarm Verge help to generate mana, while Meticulous Archive and Moment of Truth provide card advantage. Invasion of Arcavios can help to find missing combo pieces, while Chart a Course and Stock Up provide card selection. The deck aims to lock down the opponent temporarily while setting up for a game-winning play using Omniscience.

The main goal of this deck is to quickly assemble the components needed to cast Omniscience and then use it to play multiple spells in a single turn, setting up a powerful combo to overwhelm the opponent. Cards like Abuelo's Awakening, Meticulous Archive, and Moment of Truth help to find key pieces of the combo, while Confounding Riddle and Invasion of Arcavios provide disruption and control. The deck also includes some protection in the form of Ephara's Dispersal and Blast Zone, making it difficult for the opponent to stop the combo once it's in motion.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board through various removal spells and creatures with abilities that disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck aims to maintain board presence and outvalue the opponent by using cards like Archangel Elspeth and Get Lost to control the flow of the game. The inclusion of cards like Caretaker's Talent and Lay Down Arms help ensure that the deck can maintain control of the battlefield while also putting pressure on the opponent. Overall, this deck prioritizes control and disruption to secure victory.
